api_list.name: GetItem
api_list.description: Get a special Taobao Item Json format data via API, including all sub-items.

api_list.name: GetShopItem
api_list.description: Get all items of one special seller. 18 per page.

required_parameters.name: shopId
required_parameters.description:
You can get shopId on item page source code. Try ctrl+F. Keyword is shopId
**NOT Seller Id. **

api_list.name: SearchItem
api_list.description: Search items by keyword, 20 items per page.

required_parameters.name: pageNum
required_parameters.description: Page number of the query. By default is 1.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The keyword of search, for example \\\\\\\"man cloth\\\\\\\" \\\\\\\"男装\\\\\\\"

api_list.name: GetItemReview
